EmailTemplate.description: Reminder Notification for Sales about stalled Opps
EmailTemplate.name: CJ-1_cond1_html
EmailTemplate.subject: Cleanup needed on Opportunities in Stage 0
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Sales Rep,
this is a kind reminder, that you have the following opportunities in Stage 0 for more than 3 days now. Please switch them to Stage 1 (Discovering/Identifying) immediately to indicate you accept the opportunity. After you have done an initial qualification either propagate it to Stage 2 (Qualification) or Close it out as appropriate. If the opportunity is wrongly assigned to you, please contact SalesOps@tricentis.com.
